snippet.title: Arrival of Beasts Gameplay - Early Access on Steam -  2D Tower Defense Game
snippet.description:
The rank-section EarlyAccess 1 starting soon - watch the brand new gameplay trailer and join arrival of beasts. Be the BEST tower defense player out there. Invite your friends and create a team to climb up the leaderboard. Or fight alone for the first 🥇 place against the world.

Wishlisting on steam coming soon...
